full_summary:
# Regional Master Standing Offer for Fresh Eggs – Invitation to Stand-by [Expired]
=====================================

**Title**
--------

* Title (English): EC095-230008 RMSO Fresh Eggs 1st Period
* Title (French): EC095-230008 OCPR Œufs frais 1ère période

**Reference**
------------

* Reference Number: WS3930684043-Doc3966504220
* Amendment Number: 2

**Invitation Information**
------------------------

* Invitation Type: Request for Standing Offer (NCB/OCPR – Demande d’offre à commandes)
* Solicitation Number: WS3930684043
* Publication Date: April 17, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: Expired – May 2, 2023 2:00 PM
* Amendment Date: April 18, 2023

**Key Dates**
------------

* Expected Contract Start Date: May 1, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: October 31, 2023

**Commodity Information**
-----------------------

* UNSPSC Code: *50131600 (Eggs and egg substitutes)
* UNSPSC Description: *Eggs and egg substitutes

**Procurement Details**
----------------------

* Tender Status: Expired
* Procurement Method: Competitive – Open bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price (Prix le plus bas)
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) - Accord de libre-échange canadien (ALEC)
* Regions of Opportunity: None
* Regions of Delivery:
	+ Newfoundland and Labrador
	+ Canada
	+ Nova Scotia
	+ New Brunswick

**Contracting Entity Information**
--------------------------------

* Contracting Entity Name (English): Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address (English): 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* Contracting Entity Name (French):  Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
* Contact Information:
	+ Name: Andrew MacFarlane (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: <andrew.macfarlane@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
	+ Contact URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16001278
